casebody.data:
Williamson et al., Appellees, v. Toledo Hospital, Appellant.

[Cite as Williamson v. Toledo Hosp. (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 302.]

No. 85-909 Decided December 22, 1986. Williams, Jilek & Lajferty Co., L.P.A., Martin W. Williams and Drew R. Masse, for appellees. Shumaker, Loop & Kendrick, Robert G. Clayton, Jr. and Judith Ann Lanzinger, for appellant.

The judgment in this cause, having been certified by the court of appeals in case No. L-84-396 as being in conflict with Wainstein v. Univ. Hospitals of Cleve. (Apr. 14, 1985), Cuyahoga App. No. 48788, unreported, is hereby affirmed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
